name: Military Block Plane . Free Army Airplane War Game
name_original: Military Block Plane . Free Army Airplane War Game
description:
It is time to fly to the sky with the most amazing cube airplanes!

Tilt the device to move the plane and tap the screen for turbo and shooting!

We also have a multiplayer mode where you can compete with other people around the world!

Also, enjoy awesome block world planes!

Features of this game:

◉ Multiplayer!
◉ Leader Boards!
◉ Shooting!
◉ Beautiful cube planes!
◉ Explosions!
◉ Turbo!
◉ Fun for hours!

The game is starting!

Will you survive?

Twitter: @Oscarminigames
Facebook: www.facebook.com/OscarMiniGames
